ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank Dr. Heyrim Kim for her contribution in the GFDL.CM2.1 model simulation. This work was jointly supported by NSFC grant 41630423, NSF grant AGS-1565653, and JAMSTEC JIJI Theme 1 project. This is SOEST contribution number 10458, and IPRC contribution number 1346. J.S.K. is supported by the Korea Meteorological Administration Research and Development Program under Grant KMIPA 2018â€“03212 and the National Research Foundation of Korea (NRF-2018R1A5A1024958).
